description:
This is the only course on resume writing you will ever need. No fluff. Real world perspectives from a real world technology industry veteran.

24th November 2015 Updates:

  • Real world job postings to help you get started and stay on track
  • Differences between your professional achievements and accomplishments explained

Course Bonuses When You Take This Course Now:

  1. Power Resume Framework
  2. Proven Resume Templates
  3. Effective Resume Keywords
  4. Personal Critique of Your Resume
  5. Access to Power Resume Mastermind Community
  6. Power Resume Focus Session Every Month

Do you want to have a resume that brings in multiple interview offers your way?

Do you want to have a resume that recruiters and hiring managers love?

Listen. Your resume is your best bet to get ahead in your professional career. Its how you advertise yourself in the employment market.

And contrary to what you think, or may have heard – an irresistible resume is not just necessary for your success – it's mandatory.

My name is Kapil Apshankar. I am a best-selling author, a technology entrepreneur and a career transformation coach. Over the last 15 years I have interviewed thousands of individuals, hired hundreds of them – and in process scanned and read many thousand resumes.

When it comes to resumes, I know what works and what doesn't.

In this course I will teach you how you can write your own irresistible resume in sixty minutes or less. You will learn a proven system that literally helps your resume write itself. Along the way, you will master the Power Resume Framework that I created to crank out irresistible resumes on demand. And I will give you proven resume templates that make writing an irresistible resume a breeze.

Join me for this course, and I will help you make you resume sing and shine out like never before. I look forward to seeing you in the classroom.
title: Create an Irresistible Resume for Your Dream Job
